name: AudioBreak: Smash your Music!
description:
AudioBreak: Smash your Music! is a rhythm game currently being developed for Android smartphones that builds playable tracks from your music files stored in your device.

SYNOPSIS:

Take control of Joe, your player avatar tasked on clearing our playable tracks generated by your own music by strategically placing himself on top of incoming notes and smashing them to pieces.                                   

Along the way, gather up sufficient power and unleash custom abilities of your choosing to help you against the incoming waves of obstacles you might encounter as you venture deep withing your music.

                    

As you keep mastering your tracks, Joe should become stronger over time, but will you be ready to take on the threats lurking within?

FEATURES:

  • Two playable characters in this current build, each with their own unique loadout!
  • A fully fleshed out track generator born from your own music files
  • 4 different difficulties to choose from
  • A quick and easy to review tutorial for quickly getting into the game.
  • Fully offline, perfect to play on the go!
  • Things mankind was not meant to see
  • Additional difficulty settings like [Fragile Self Mode] and [Nightmares] for those craving an extra challenge!

CREDITS:

Game developed by R.A.V.S.O.

Music used on the demo track provided by: Chiptune Heroes - Squarium

NOTES:

  • Audiobreak currently only handles .mp3 files (maximum of 15 minutes duration per track)
  • For best results when browsing your music files ensure they are located on an internal directory over external.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

Download the available .APK file and install in your android device (compatible from Android 6.0 and higher)

Make sure you allow the game permissions to access your files as AudioBreak relies on loading your audio files in order to generate playable tracks from them.
